headline: How Should Investors View CenterPoint Energy After Its 25% 2025 Rally?
summary: If you are eyeing CenterPoint Energy and wondering whether now is the moment to act, you are definitely not alone. The stock’s impressive climb of 24.5% year-to-date and a robust 34.9% over the last year has caught the attention of investors looking for stable growth in a volatile market. With a five-year return of 114.5%, CenterPoint Energy has outpaced many of its peers, signaling strong long-term momentum. Even in the last week, a minor pullback of just -0.7% could be offering a breather,...

headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights Atmos Energy, CenterPoint Energy, Consolidated Water and Northwest Natural Holding
summary: Defensive utility plays gain attention as ATO, CNP, CWCO, and NWN offer low-beta stability amid market volatility.
